Chap. Eighty-Two - How the Christian Chooses His Recreation

     Christian Recreation Versus Worldly Amusement.-- There is a distinction between recreation and amusement. Recreation, when true to its name, re-creation, tends to strengthen and build up. Calling us aside from our ordinary cares and occupations, it affords refreshment for mind and body and thus enables us to return with new vigor to the earnest work of life.
